channel.title: 01_upgrades on SWT EToys Notes
channel.description: Recent content in 01_upgrades on SWT EToys Notes

item.title: Upgrades
item.description: Upgrades This section records & documents upgrades / conversions which have been registered with the SmartRefStream.

item.title: #Project Bug
item.description: The provided Squeak 5.1 Image causes problems when loading projects due to the following circumstances: Squeak 3 has a #Project class. Squeak 5 has a #Project class, which has become a super class of different kinds of Projects (such as #MVCProject and #MorphicProject). The Squeak 3 #Project has been superseded by #MorphicProject in Squeak 5. As such a rename has been introduced in SmartRefStream>>initKnownRenames. This rename however was not applied consistently, causing different code paths to work with different names, inevitably leading to an error condition (”Error: class not in structures list”).

item.title: Class Replacements
item.description: The following is a list of classes which no longer exist and have for now been replaced by other classes, usually a super class, if available: MultiNewParagraph ⇒ NewParagraph UserText ⇒ TextMorph

item.title: Fonts
item.description: While loading a project, an error occured in TextStyle>>addNewFontSize: because a fontArray contained a TTCFontSet along with TTCFonts. As such an extra check was introduced to ignore objects which are not instances of TTCFont.
